write_up: Movie samples, long extended intros with mixtape tags everywhere, yep, it’s a SoundCloud song. D. Savage couldn’t make the switch to the mainstream, but he’s so comfortable here, laid back in the beat, a natural and wavy atmosphere all around him. It’s like a strong punch to the gut when he comes on the song.
lyric: Hit ‘em with the stick, hit em with the pump / Watch his body flip, we don’t give a shit
